1.content: One day, Amy was walking in the back yard. She still went to school, though it was summer vacation. Just as she ran out of ideas, she thought about shrinking the apple in the kitchen, and to her suprise, it shrunk. She tried to grow it back, and grew, but just a little bigger then it was. "Wow" she thought, "I can shrink and grow things, though it looks like it doesn't grow much. Maybe it just adds a little bit when returning it to its original size." Have you thought of anything yet?" Katie asked. "No" she lied, "I think it was nothing but a stupid space rock. I'm going to my room and rest."
